data.title: Google, Facebook CEOs oversaw illegal ad auction deal that gave Facebook an advantage, states allege
data.description: Google and Facebook's chief executives personally oversaw a 2018 deal that advantaged Facebook on Google's ad auctions, a group of states alleged on Friday.

data.title: Google expands London property empire with $1 billion office purchase
data.description: Google has bought a colorful office space in London for $1 billion while it waits for building work on its heavily-delayed U.K. headquarters to be completed.

data.title: January 6 committee subpoenas Google, Facebook, Twitter and Reddit in probe of Capitol attack
data.description: The Jan. 6 investigation wants records relating to domestic terrorism, the spread of misinformation and efforts to influence or overturn the 2020 election.

data.title: Amazon Echo Dot vs. Google Nest Mini: Here's which smart speaker to get
Google ordered to turn over documents related to anti-union efforts in NLRB case
data.description: A judge has ordered Google to turn over hundreds of internal documents — many related to its efforts to quash an employee union — as part of a National Labor Relations Board case over the tech giant's firing of former employees.
